title: Social Engagement Recommendations – Personalized Reminders for Upcoming Social Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest upcoming social activities based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and prevent feelings of isolation.

title: Facilitated Communication Channels – Simplified Video Calling Features
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want an easy way to make video calls to my family and friends so that I can stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Interest-based Activity Group Connections
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to be matched with local activity groups or clubs based on my interests so that I can engage in social activities and feel less isolated.

title: Memory Aid for Social Interactions – Reminders of Names and Relationships of Contacts
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me of the names and relationships of my contacts during video calls so that I can feel more connected and engaged in conversations without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Enhanced Remote Family Engagement – Shared Calendars for Family Events and Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to share my calendar with my children so that they can help me remember important family events and activities, ensuring I stay connected and engaged with them.

title: Personalized Emotional Support – Customizable Check-Ins for Emotional Well-Being
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want customizable check-ins for emotional support so that I can feel more connected and engaged with my family and friends, reducing feelings of isolation.

title: Local Resource Awareness
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to access a directory of nearby senior-friendly venues and services so that I can stay socially connected and engaged in my community without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
